properties.Audit: Two long revegetated haggs reprofiled to a good standard, although no dams were installed, NT 88574 19101 & NT 88637 19119. The haggs were dry with no apparent water flow. However, close monitoring is advised, and if any evidence of erosion becomes evident, remedial action would be required.

Two long revegetated haggs reprofiled to a good standard, although no dams were installed, NT 88574 19101 & NT 88637 19119. The haggs were dry with no apparent water flow. However, close monitoring is advised, and if any evidence of erosion becomes evident, remedial action would be required.
A small erosion channel appears to be forming at NT 88463 19178 between turves. Monitoring recommended.
Small dams placed over mineral soils partially successful, peat hags reprofiled at NT 89213 19407.  'Hagg' appears to be a minor/unmarked water course. Monitoring advised
